creditline: Gift of Helena Hernmarck in celebration of the 100th anniversary of the Minneapolis Institute of Arts
description: white panel with dowels at top and bottom; cream/white ground; abstract imagery with yellow areas and grey bar at top, with rectangles and squares; horizontal area above center with longer, looped cream colored fibers; blurry-edged blue oval shape below center, with three other blue blurry-edged forms in LLQ; grey band at bottom with three grey rectangles
title: Spring, Rain, Wind, Sun
